title: it offends me as a support main
body:
im personally offended as a support main that we get autofill protection for playing support for two reasons
1. ik its to reward us for the least played role, but come on, do we really have to be rewarded for playing support, it sickens me
2. point one is constantly reminded by the fact that as a support main autofill protected will be appearing at the top of my screen 99% of the time, and when i want to take a break from 10-18 support games in a row by going mid primary sup secondary, i get support

replies.body:
Choose mid and top, usually get mid

Or duo with someone who play support
funny story, my easiest climbing method (im silver four) is to premade with my bronze 3, or i think hes 2 now, whatever, friend who goes sup prim adc secondary, he is my go to man for playing mid
dont wanna risk getting a role im bad at

unfortunately supports are a kind of fill class. more often that not people who play support didn't queue for it, and aren't mains. this is why support mains can seem to carry, cause they are good at it. but this results in support mains always getting support, so you would have to take a chance and pick mid/adc or mid/top in order to get mid.

that is one of the truest statements ive seen on the boards, but its also annoying when anyone plays lux or brand and think they can support just by playing full ap on these champs, happens immensly rare in Ranked but ppl underestimate support mains work
